actionCalls.name: Create_Patient_Account_For_Household_Member
actionCalls.label: Create Patient Account For Household Member

rules.name: true_result
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 12) AND 2 AND 3) OR ((1 OR 12) AND 4 AND (5 OR 6) AND 7 AND 8 AND 9) OR ((1 OR 12) AND 4 AND 10 AND 11 AND 8 AND 9)
rules.label: true

formulas.name: Age
formulas.expression: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( {!get_age.Date_of_Birth__c}) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH({!get_age.Date_of_Birth__c}) , DAY( {!get_age.Date_of_Birth__c}) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( {!get_age.Date_of_Birth__c}), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( {!get_age.Date_of_Birth__c}) -1 ), null)

value.stringValue: Do you want to be followed

fields.fieldText: Please verify that the following information is correct.

fields.fieldText: Has the individual been diagnosed with any of the following conditions?

fields.name: noQUarantine
fields.fieldText: This contact does not need to be quarantined based off of vaccination staff or previous diagnosis of COVID-19. Please inform them that they should monitor for COVID-19 symptoms for 14 days after exposure. If they develop symptoms they should get tested and give the COVID hotline a call.

fields.name: Are_you_staying_away_from_others
fields.fieldText: Are you staying away from others?

fields.name: Test_display
fields.fieldText: Testing details {!ClinicalAssessmentFor}

textTemplates.name: AsymptomaticResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} may be infected or have a risk for infection. Ensure that {!IndividualName} remains in isolation, stays away from public places, and refrains from having visitors.

textTemplates.name: ClinicalAssessmentFor
textTemplates.text: for {!IndividualName}

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_DOB
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid date of birth

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_Email
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid email address.

textTemplates.name: ErrorMessage_Phone
textTemplates.text: Enter a valid phone number.

textTemplates.name: NoRiskResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} doesn't require testing. Based on {!IndividualName}'s responses, there's no evidence of symptoms of infection. {!IndividualName} can stay healthy by practicing social distancing to reduce community transmission and should follow guidelines from local officials.

textTemplates.name: SymptomaticResult
textTemplates.text:
Assessment Results: {!PatientStatus}


{!IndividualName} has symptoms of infection. We'll be in contact regarding self-care steps. Ensure that {!IndividualName} remains in isolation, stays away from public places, and refrains from having visitors.
